name: @lalo3k/linting
description: These are settings for ESLint and Prettier that I use in my projects.

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor -git-tag-version && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major -git-tag-version && npm run publish
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm version prerelease -git-tag-version && npm run publish

author: lalo3k
